data.name: Emerl Alpha Costume - DLC Costume For Burning Requiem: Fates
data.detailed_description: This is an outfit used for Emerl in very early stages of her character. Her look has been updated but this old look is still included as a bonus for Patrons and Costume Pass Users. This can also be bought separately. This dlc requires the base game of Burning Requiem: Fates in order to use!
data.about_the_game: This is an outfit used for Emerl in very early stages of her character. Her look has been updated but this old look is still included as a bonus for Patrons and Costume Pass Users. This can also be bought separately. This dlc requires the base game of Burning Requiem: Fates in order to use!
data.short_description: "Burning Requiem: Fates" is a new 2-On-2 Indie Fighting Game produced by Project Requiem! Seeking to shake up the fighting game formula to bring some new flair! Featuring characters coming from the new tie in webcomic series of "Burning Requiem"!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 21H2
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2400
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 GDDR6 @ 6GB (192 bits)
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition Audio Device

package_groups.title: Buy Emerl Alpha Costume - DLC Costume For Burning Requiem: Fates
